message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a split of $60 for me and $40 for you. Given that the money loses value for me as rounds pass, it makes sense to agree now rather than risk the discount. I hope you see the fairness in settling early. Looking forward to your acceptance!

Hi Alice, since we are going to negotiate, I propose an even split of $50 for each of us. This way, we both get a fair share and can avoid any potential losses due to inflation. Letâ€™s settle this amicably!
